title: Pixel 4XL - letting go of Power Button turns off phone
content:
Hi there,

I've found an issue with my Pixel 4XL which I can't find described elsewhere.

Releasing the power button is seemingly turning off the phone.

I can start the phone by pressing and holding the power button. It boots up OK. At any point if I release the power button, the phone turns straight off to black screen. I can get all the way to the normal home screen, but the phone dies straight to black screen.

I have tried the soft reset (power + up volume) and it still happens. If I let go of power at any point, the screen turns to black.

Any idea how I can fix this?

Thanks,

Nick
